name: Oxion Velocity
description: Oxion Velocity is a futuristic racing game where up to thirty competitors race on massive circuits inside energon-powered machines in an intergalactic Circuit.  In the year 2525 the Oxion Energy corporation hosts the annual Velocity Racing Tournament where the winner get a grand prize of any value.  Each racer has there own motives for racing in this Tournament, they also have friends, relatives and enemies to race against. The Tournament takes place on various planet throughout the galaxy.
